betControls.betStopLossTooltipText: Use Stop on Loss to stop autobet after losing a specified amount. For example, if you start with $100 and you set Stop on Loss to $25: if your balance went below $75 autobet will stop.
betControls.betStopTooltipText: Use Stop on Profit to stop autobet after profiting a specified amount. For example, if you start with $100 and you set Stop on Profit to $25: if your balance went above $125 autobet will stop.

crash.lagDetected: Slow network detected, check your network connection

crashAndColorsDescription.colorsDesc1: and hash it (SHA256), creating a new Server Seed. Then we take that Server Seed and hash that too. We repeat this process until we have 2 million hashes -- 2 million server seeds. The very first game uses the 2 millionth server seed (in the codesandbox below), and each game after that works backwards down the list of server seeds. Second game uses the 1,999,999th hash and so on and so forth.
crashAndColorsDescription.colorsDesc2: is a public key that we agree to using before we know what it is. We commit to the hash of a crypto block before that block is mined, and we create all the server seed hashes before committing to this block. This ensures that we could not control the outcome of each game. The current Client Seed is in the codesandbox below.
crashAndColorsDescription.colorsETHBlock: the hash from a crypto block (like Bitcoin or Ethereum)
crashAndColorsDescription.crashDesc1: and hash it (SHA256), creating a new Server Seed. Then we take that Server Seed and hash that too. We repeat this process until we have 2 million hashes -- 2 million server seeds. The very first game uses the 2 millionth server seed (in the codesandbox below), and each game after that works backwards down the list of server seeds. Second game uses the 1,999,999th hash and so on and so forth.
crashAndColorsDescription.crashDesc2: is a public key that we agree to using before we know what it is. We commit to the hash of a crypto block before that block is mined, and we create all the server seed hashes before committing to this block. This ensures that we could not control the outcome of each game. The current Client Seed is in the codesandbox below.
crashAndColorsDescription.crashETHBlock: the hash from a crypto block (like Bitcoin or Ethereum)
crashAndColorsDescription.desc3: To verify this, you can input the Server Seed to your game in the code below, and you should see the server seeds and game results for the previous 100 games.

fairRoute.fairRouteText1: Roobet prides itself on being an honest casino, so it seems fitting that we have taken measures to ensure our games are provably fair.
fairRoute.fairRouteText2: Provably fair means you do not need to “trust” us to be fair; it means you can prove our fairness.
fairRoute.fairRouteText3: Each bet made on Roobet can be verified so that you know with certainty the house could have in no way “chosen” the outcome.
fairRoute.fairRouteText4: You will see several tabs above each named after a game we offer. By clicking them you will be able to see how we generate our bet results.

fairRouteBlackjack.actionsHashDescription: a hash of the chronologically serialized game actions
fairRouteBlackjack.clientSeedExplained: The Client Seed is a hash from a randomly generated alpha-numeric sequence per game.
fairRouteBlackjack.gameNonceDescription: a number that increases with each bet
fairRouteBlackjack.nonceDesc1: After each bet you make, the
fairRouteBlackjack.serverSHA256Outro: ) of the Server Seed. This does not change unless you change it or reveal your Server Seed.
fairRouteBlackjack.titleDescription: This game uses four (4) ingredients to calculate each result:
fairRouteBlackjack.verifyExplained: When you verify a bet, some things happen:
fairRouteBlackjack.verifyFurtherExplained: With this information, you can do a number of things to verify your bet further:
fairRouteBlackjack.verifyFurtherPoint01: You can take a SHA256 of the revealed server seed and make sure that it equals what we gave you as the encrypted hash
fairRouteBlackjack.verifyFurtherPoint02: Using the code sandbox provided below, you can run the exact same code we ran to determine the result of the game using your revealed Server Seed
fairRouteBlackjack.verifyPoint01: We reveal the Server Seed of which we gave you an encrypted hash of
fairRouteBlackjack.verifyPoint02: We re-run the three ingredients (Server Seed, Client Seed, Nonce) to re-generate the shuffling hash of the bet for you to see

kothDialog.astroBody1: Become Astro Roo and collect a share from every wager on Crash. The longer you're Astro Roo, the more you'll earn. Be brave! There's no limit to how long you can stay Astro Roo. So hold on until the last moment to make your ride hard to beat.
kothDialog.astroBody2: To become Astro Roo, prove your bravery by riding a crash further than the current Astro Roo, with a minimum wager of {{ minimumWager }}. There can only be one!
kothDialog.bulletPoint1: This promotion is ran for a limited time only.
kothDialog.bulletPoint2: Should Roobet.com detect fraud, foul play, any manipulation of the promotion rules or abuse of the promotion, the relevant player and their related accounts will be suspended from the current and any future promotions.
kothDialog.bulletPoint3: Roobet.com reserves the right to amend, suspend or cancel the promotion at any time.
kothDialog.kingBody1: Become King Roo and take your share from every wager across all slots. The longer you stay King, the more you'll earn. Stay on top!
kothDialog.kingBody2: To become King Roo, you need to hit a 100x multiplier on any slot, with a minimum wager of {{ minimumWager }}. There can only be one King; fight to maintain your position!

raffle.aboutRaffleDesc:
Once the raffle begins, your ticket count will automatically increase with every qualified wager until the raffle has ended. At the end of the countdown, all tickets are entered into a pool and {{ winnerCount}} winners are drawn at random, to split {{ prizeAmount }} or 2 BTC (whichever is more).  

Current Top 5 Payouts:
1st - $13,000 | 2nd - $9,750 | 3rd - $6,500 | 4th - $5,850 | 5th - $5,200

Earn as many tickets as possible to improve your chances to win! If you win, your funds will automatically be added to your Roobet balance and you'll be notified by email.
raffle.howToEnterRule1: Earn {{ticketsPerBenjamin}} ticket(s) for every ${{dollarAmount}} USD wagered site-wide.
raffle.mod: Earn {{ticketsPerBenjamin}} ticket(s) for every ${{amount}} USD wagered on <0></0>.
raffle.term1: Sponsored funds will not reward tickets for the promotion.
raffle.term2: Should Roobet.com detect fraud, foul play, any manipulation of the promotion rules or abuse of the promotion, the relevant player and their related accounts will be suspended from the current and any future promotions.
raffle.term3: Roobet.com reserves the right to amend, suspend or cancel the promotion at any time.
raffle.term4: Bets need to be placed and settled within the end date to count towards the raffle.
raffle.term5: Please view our <0>Terms of Service</0> for further details.

vip.benefitDescription1: Invites to VIP-only private events, around the globe.
vip.benefitDescription2: Compete at the highest level with other VIPs.
vip.benefitDescription3: Wake up to surprises like free spins, credits, and gifts.
vip.benefitDescription4: Personalized assistance for a premium gaming experience.
vip.benefitDescription5: Find peace of mind with extra rebates on eligible losses.
vip.benefitDescription6: Maximize your winnings with enhanced rewards every wager.
vip.faqHowToJoin: Membership Criteria and Exclusive Services at Roobet VIP Club
vip.faqHowToJoinAnswer: To maintain exclusivity and an exceptional level of services, Roobet VIP Club is strictly invitation only. Players who meet our criteria will be contacted by a member of our dedicated VIP team.
vip.faqWhatAdditionalInforationIsNeeded: Is there a requirement for me to furnish supplementary information in order to attain VIP membership?
vip.faqWhatAdditionalInforationIsNeededAnswe: We may ask for your hospitality preferences, or if you have any pastimes or hobbies, but this is only because our VIP team really does go the extra mile when looking to reward you!
vip.faqWhatDoINeedToPlay: What specific criteria must be met to attain membership in the Roobet VIP program?
vip.faqWhatDoINeedToPlayAnswer: All activity is taken into consideration, including slots, live casino games, and house games such as crash and roulette. Above all, we value loyalty.
vip.faqWhyIsRoobetVipTheBest: What distinguishes the Roobet VIP Club from others, setting it apart as a superior choice?
vip.faqWhyIsRoobetVipTheBestAnswer1: We are committed to providing the best possible experience for our VIPs. We offer a dedicated VIP team, exclusive promotions, and a personal touch that you won’t find anywhere else.
vip.faqWhyIsRoobetVipTheBestAnswer2: Honesty, attention to detail, and integrity are all the hallmarks of the Roobet VIP Program.
vip.faqWhyIsRoobetVipTheBestAnswer3: Members of our VIP Club receive prompt and exceptional service that is beyond compare. We are confident that, once you become a member of our VIP Club, you will never look back.
vip.featureDescription1: Your loyalty enhances your likelihood of attaining VIP status.
vip.featureDescription2: Consistent and responsible engagement with Roobet enhances the likelihood of being noticed as a valued player.
vip.featureDescription3: Whether you are passionate about Slots, Live Casino or Crash, using a variety of our products can increase your chances.
vip.vipBenefitDescription: Experience exceptional service and incredible rewards with Roobet VIP Club!
vip.vipClubInvitationDescription: Immerse yourself in additional games to increase the likelihood of securing an exclusive VIP invitation, unlocking a world of premium perks and privilege.
vip.vipClubInvitationTitle1: Play More Games for an Exclusive
vip.vipClubMembershipDescription: The most rewarding VIP club in the industry, offering unparalleled perks and exclusive privileges for an extraordinary gaming experience.

vipBenefits.additionalBenefits: That's not all, as a VIP, you can also look forward to 10% Cashback every Monday on the previous week's Net losses*
vipBenefits.benefitAdditionalSpins: On top of this, you can also qualify for additional Roospins every single Friday when you make the qualifying deposits! Win or lose!
vipBenefits.benefitDescription: Not only will you have your own personal VIP manager on hand to assist you with your account, but you can also look forward to an array of extras, including:
vipBenefits.benefitHeader: Mr Roo and his VIP Team have many wonderful things in store for you.
vipBenefits.benefitList1: Weekly and monthly special VIP communications and competitions.
vipBenefits.benefitList3: Direct contact to the VIP department to ensure your queries are resolved with the utmost priority.
vipBenefits.benefitList4: Monthly VIP newsletter showcasing upcoming game releases and other key Roobet events and a VIP Roospin gift!
vipBenefits.benefitList5: Access to top-class hospitality events. Don't forget to let us know what you like!
vipBenefits.benefitList6: Birthday and Xmas gifts and bonuses.
vipBenefits.depositAmountsTier1GamesHeader: Deposit between $150 - $4,999.99, we will credit you with Tier 1 50 VIP Roospins at $2.5 per spin on one of the following games:
vipBenefits.depositAmountsTier1Gameslist: Rich Wilde and the Shield of Athena, Leprechaun Goes to Egypt, Book of Dead, Banana Rock, and Cat Wilde and the Doom of Dead
vipBenefits.depositRequirements: All deposits must be made between Friday 00:01am and Thursday 11:59:59pm CST to qualify.
vipBenefits.depositsAbove5000: For deposits above $5,000, you will receive Roospins on our Game of the week**:
vipBenefits.gameOfTheWeekDisclaimer: **Game of the Week will be determined by the VIP team and will change weekly.
